DRINK /
LOBBY BAR AND
OUTDOOR LOUNGE
BY EMPLOYEES

Overkill? Sure, but we couldn't resist. Getting one of New York City's most loved bars to turn their attention to establishing their first hotel endeavor outside of NYC means we've got something special brewing (and it's not just the house infusions).

Employees Only brings its signature style, recipes, service and essence to our drinks and our spaces. Enjoy masterfully crafted cocktails while you lounge on a pool chair, or in our intimate courtyard. Or grab a tropical drink in the hotel lobby bar before venturing off into the night.

Certainly, we could have gotten away with your standard hotel bar. But “standard” isn't part of our vocabulary.
